Text Align

# Text Align

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                | Support        |
| -------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
text-left
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
text-center
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
text-right
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
text-justify
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
text-start
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
text-end
```     | ✅ Full Support |
